lead_paragraph: The account is part of the holdings of the institution’s principal fund-raising arm, whose finances, as well as those of the college’s president, are already under scrutiny.

headline.print_headline: Missing $500,000 Gift Spurs Inquiry at City College
headline.main: $76 Where There Should Be $600,000: Missing City College Donation Prompts Inquiry

snippet: The account is part of the holdings of the institution’s principal fund-raising arm, whose finances, as well as those of the college’s president, are already under scrutiny....
abstract: City University of New York investigates whether $500,000 donation to Martin and Toni Sosnoff Fund for the Arts at City College of New York was improperly diverted; fund is part of City College 21st Century Foundation, which, along with finances of college's president Lisa S Coico, is under investigation by federal prosecutors for possible monetary misuse.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Sosnoff, Martin and Toni, Fund for the Arts
